backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing chatroom, messaging, user profiles, reactions, GIF search, link previews, access control, and blob storage with HTTP outcalls for external integrations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting automatic link detection/embedding for multiple platforms and modified Add Media button with image upload and Giphy integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, chat UI, message handling, avatar management, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script import.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup for lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting file uploads, Giphy GIF search with debouncing, and avatar removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll, reply functionality, and message filtering to hide Creator messages without media.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and formatted timestamps. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog component for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload/URL input (supports image upload, YouTube/Twitch videos, and Twitter posts). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter embed previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with app logo, username editing functionality (with character limit and progress bar), avatar picker button, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication must not be introduced to keep the app anonymous.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, pin/reply actions, and embedded media (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, Rumble, images, voice messages). Handles reaction management and Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text area, image upload, GIF search (via Giphy API), and voice recording functionality. Includes upload progress tracking, character limits, and debounced GIF search.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) in an iframe with an unpin button, rendered in a fixed aspect-ratio container.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that renders an audio player with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and a progress slider. Handles audio playback state, metadata loading, and ensures only one audio plays at a time across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Custom hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries (especially empty arrays) and forcing a refetch. Exposes a recovery-in-progress signal and resets on actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flows, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle. Exports useInternetIdentity hook and InternetIdentityProvider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations including fetching, searching, filtering by category, creating/deleting chatrooms, sending messages, and managing reactions. Handles username/userId from localStorage and normalizes query keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile viewport fixes, iOS input zoom prevention, and custom voice message player range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration including API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function that formats numbers into compact notation with k/M/B suffixes (e.g., 1234 -> '1.2k').
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas while preserving quality and orientation, with progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM snapshotting, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs from YouTube, Twitch, Twitter/X, Instagram, TikTok, and Rumble URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for managing and deleting chatrooms, protected by password authentication stored in session storage with filtering and bulk operations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom page component that fetches and displays a specific chatroom by ID, handles view count incrementing, and renders the ChatArea component with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page component that displays a list of chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, includes a create chatroom dialog, and handles navigation to individual chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting requirements for lowercase category tags, automatic media link embedding (YouTube, Twitch, X, Instagram, TikTok, Rumble, images), and Add Media button modifications for image/GIF uploads only.
